articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a reply message on June 18 from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba.
					 The message said:
					
					 Expressing thanks to you for extending warm congratulations on my birthday, I, availing myself of this opportunity, affirm the will to continue strengthening the fraternal relations between our two countries.
					
					 I extend my heartfelt greetings to you.

articles.title: Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung to Be Engraved on Order, Medal and Badge
articles.content:
Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung to Be Engraved on Order, Medal and Badge 
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK decided to engrave the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on Order of Kim Il Sung, Gold Medal of Kim Il Sung Prize, Medal of Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and  Badge of Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize. 
					 The relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on June 20.
					
					 The SPA Presidium said that such decision was made in reflection of the unanimous will of all the party members, service members and other people to hold the President in high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages and carry to completion his sacred revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Widow of Ex-President of ITF and Her Party Fly Back
articles.content:
Widow of Ex-President of ITF Flies Back
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Han Chun Hui, widow of Choe Hong Hui, and her party flew back from here on June 21 after taking part in the memorial service to mark the 10th anniversary of the death of Choe, ex-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF).
					 The delegation of the ITF departed earlier.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Songun torch prize was closed in the DPRK.
					 Players of South Phyongan Province came first in team standing by winning in women's football and women's volleyball and men's boxing and marathon.
					
					 Players of North Phyongan Province proved successful in women's basketball, men's weightlifting and women's marathon while players of South Hamgyong Province placed first in women's weightlifting, women's boxing and men and women's field and track and players of South Hwanghae Province in men's football and men and women's judo.
					
					 Its closing ceremony took place in Haeju, South Hwanghae Province, on Wednesday.

articles.title: June Calls for Nation-Wide Action against U.S. and Dictatorship
articles.content:
June Calls for Nation-Wide Action against U.S. and Dictatorship
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- June is recorded as the historic month of particular significance in the history of the struggle of the Korean nation against the U.S. and dictatorship.
					 When the U.S. and its south Korean puppet forces launched brigandish invasion against the young DPRK on June 25, 1950, its army and people immediately went over to a counter-offensive unprecedented in the world history of wars, inflicting a merciless punishment upon the aggressors. In the days of the hard-fought war, they humbled the arrogant U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world and honorably protected the sovereignty of the country. Through this they demonstrated the stamina of heroic Korea and recorded a shining page in the history of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle of the nation. 
					
					The Koreans' glorious history of the struggle against the U.S. and fascism also recorded the June popular uprising which broke out in June 1987.  More than five million people from all walks of life took part in the uprising that lasted for 20 days from June 10. During the uprising people throughout south Korea including Seoul, Pusan, Taegu, Kwangju, Mokpho and Jeju waged a heroic struggle against foreign domination and the tyrannical rule of the military fascist junta, chanting slogans "Down with dictatorship," "Let's drive out U.S. imperialists," "national reunification", etc.
					
					 The June popular uprising registered a shining page in the history of the south Korean people's struggle against the U.S. and fascism to put an end to the dictatorial rule of outside forces and their stooges and bring about new independent and democratic politics and new life.
					
					 Upon hearing news that two schoolgirls were driven over to death by an armored car of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces on June 13, 2002, the south Korean people waged fierce, sacred resistance against the U.S. all the year round, carrying forward the fighting spirit of the June popular resistance fighters. In those days they held anti-U.S. candle light rallies in different places, demanding the pullout of U.S. forces and tearing Stars and Stripes to pieces. This was an eruption of the pent-up hatred and resentment of the people at outside forces and traitors. 
					
					 June 15, 2000 witnessed the historic Pyongyang summit, the first of its kind in the history of the Korean nation's division for more than half a century. This provided a historic landmark in improving the inter-Korean relations and ushering in a new era of independence and reunification. 
					
					 The publication of the declaration provided all Koreans with guidelines for settling the issue of national reunification free from foreign interference.
					
					 All Koreans rose in a nation-wide struggle to reunify the country through the wisdom and efforts of the Koreans, rejecting outside forces, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" strictly based on the principle of independence and unity, the core of the national issue.
					
					 The period since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration witnessed epoch-making successes in the efforts to improve the north-south relations and in the movement for national reunification, something hardly imaginable in the past.
					
					 The north-south relations of confrontation in the past were replaced by the ties of reconciliation and cooperation while cooperation and exchange were brisk between pro-reunification movement bodies and non-governmental bodies and visits, solidarity and alliance were realized in the north and the south.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification, the new era of independence and reunification, clearly taught all Koreans the truth that they can surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification should they pool their efforts.
					
					 Fully expressed in those days of sacred struggle was the ardent desire of the Koreans to see outside forces withdrawn from this land and achieve independence, democracy and reunification as early as possible.
					
					 But the great spirit of the declaration and the cherished desire of the brave participants in the struggle against the U.S. and dictatorship have not come true.
					
					 The U.S. forces are still present in south Korea, wantonly violating the sovereignty of the south Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. political, economic and military domination over south Korea and meddling in its affairs have become evermore undisguised since Lee Myung Bak came to power, in particular.
					
					 The Lee group, sycophantic and subservient to the U.S., singled out stronger alliance with it as a top-priority task from the outset of its office and concluded with its master such traitorous agreements as FTA, selling the interests of the south Koreans to foreign forces lock, stock and barrel. 
					
					 The Lee group's worst sycophancy and submission to outside forces have caused tragedies. They are allowed to lord it over in south Korea. The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces commit plunder, rape and man killings in streets and villages of south Korea in broad daylight. But they are overlooked by the Lee group. 
					
					 It has resorted to fascist suppression and enforced an unpopular rule that put even the successive puppet ruling quarters into the shade, reducing south Korea to the world's worst tundra of human rights and a hell on earth. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is brutally suppressing not only the progressive forces of south Korea desirous of national reconciliation, unity and reunification but those who struggled for elementary right to existence by branding them as "forces following the north."
					
					 Such exciting events as those witnessed by the June 15 era are no longer found in the north-south relations at present due to the moves of the rat-like Lee group totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and going reckless in the moves for confrontation against reunification. 
					
					 The U.S. and its south Korean puppet forces have become extremely reckless in their moves to unleash the second Korean War.
					
					 They are staging ceaseless war maneuvers in various parts of south Korea to start a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 They are openly kicking up ruckuses to incite a war atmosphere. Visits to "cemeteries" of those aggressors killed in the last Korean War were arranged to hold memorial services. Even a contest in presenting "war scenarios" was held. 
					
					 The above-said facts go to prove that it is impossible to achieve elementary democracy in south Korean society, much less accomplishing national reconciliation and unity and the cause of reunification as long as the Lee group of traitors are allowed to stay in power. 
					
					 The times and history call on all Koreans in the north, the south and overseas to courageously turn out in the anti-U.S. resistance and in the just patriotic struggle for implementing the declaration.
					
					 All Koreans are called upon to turn out in a nationwide struggle for making a clean sweep of the Lee group and the clan of the "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Movement of Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Movement of Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung made a historic speech "Let Us Prevent a National Partition and Reunify the Country" on June 23, Juche 62 (1973).
					 In the speech he clarified the five-point policy for Korea's reunification. The keynote of the policy is to defuse the military confrontation and tensions between the north and the south, realize many-sided cooperation and exchange between them, convene a Great National Congress composed of representatives of the people of all walks of life and representatives of political parties and social organizations in the north and the south, establish a north-south federation with a single name -- the Federal Republic of Koryo -- and enter the United Nations with this nomenclature.
					
					 For its patriotic intention, fairness and truthfulness, the five-point policy touched the hearts of all Koreans and displayed great vitality in the development of the north-south relations and the reunification movement.
					
					In line with this policy all Koreans had worked hard to defuse the military confrontation and create peaceful preconditions for national reunification, defending the peace of the Korean Peninsula from the persistent war moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad.
					
					 In the course, such agreements were reached between the north and the south as the North-South Agreement on Reconciliation, Nonaggression, Cooperation and Exchange.
					
					 The movement for national reconciliation, unity and reunification gained in scope and the June 15 era of reunification came to Korea with the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration was also organized as a permanent nationwide solidarity body for the reunification movement. Since its birth the body has displayed its might.
					
					 Kim Il Sung's feats for national reunification will always remain in all Koreans' mind.

articles.title: Seoul Liberation Operation Commanded by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Seoul Liberation Operation Commanded by Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- On June 25, 1950, the south Korean forces launched a surprise attack on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea all along the 38th parallel at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists to provoke the Korean War.
					 But, overpowered by a prompt counterattack of the heroic Korean People's Army, they lost Seoul City three days after the outbreak of the war and fled southward.
					
					 The victory in the Seoul liberation operation was attributable to the command of President Kim Il Sung, a prominent military strategist.
					
					 Having set the western front as a target of main attack, he issued an order to the main KPA units to swiftly carry out an operation to liberate Seoul City.
					
					 The operation was of weighty significance in smashing the enemy's main forces at the beginning of counterattack and making greater military gains in the strategic depth.
					
					 To designate places vulnerable to attack as targets of main strike had been a common principle for winning victories in battles.
					
					However, the President made a decision to attack Seoul where many enemy forces were amassed.
					
					 It was a strategic policy that could bring a total destruction to the enemy.

articles.title: U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Triangular Military Alliance Censured: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Triangular Military Alliance Censured: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S., Japan and south Korea are reported to start a joint military exercise in waters off the Korean Peninsula on Thursday.
					 It is said that the military drill will focus on "improving the coordinated capabilities and information exchange" for the "promotion of joint rescue of disaster sufferers and maritime security".
					
					 The unprecedented joint military exercise is to be kicked off with June 25 when the U.S. imperialists unleashed the Korean War just days away. This is a grave development that can never be overlooked.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a by-lined commentary.
					
					 The U.S. has long cried out for tightened alliance through the U.S.-Japan "security treaty" and the U.S.-south Korea "mutual defense treaty". It has established the system of triangular military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea by closely linking these two "treaties", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is contemplating realizing its strategy for putting the Asia-Pacific under its control and the strategy toward the DPRK by relying on the triangular alliance. It works hard to use the south Korean puppet forces and Japanese "Self Defense Forces" as shock brigades for realizing the Asia-Pacific strategy and proxy forces for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The dangerous moves to knock into shape the triangular military nexus is an act going against the trend of the times for regional peace and stability including the Korean Peninsula. Dark clouds of a new war are thus hanging heavily in Northeast Asia including the peninsula.
					
					 But such moves of the hostile forces will get them nowhere.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK that have consolidated the war deterrent in every way by the might of Songun remain sharply vigilant against the joint military exercise. The U.S. would be well advised to clearly face up to the trend of the times and immediately stop its reckless act of sparking off Cold War in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Is Ever-victorious Banner: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Is Ever-victorious Banner: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The example of patriotism in the DPRK was personally set by leader Kim Jong Il in practice and it shines with his august name, said Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article. 
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's is the greatest patriotism that holds the highest and the most shining position in the development of patriotic idea.
					
					 The idea of loving the country and the people and the Korean nation-first spirit now in full display among the army and the people in the DPRK would have been unthinkable without Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism gives all-round answers to all theoretical and practical problems arising in carrying out the patriotic cause. 
					
					 His whole life of patriotic devotion was noticed by intense loyalty by which he defended and exalted the country liberated and built by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The course of the Songun revolution covered by Kim Jong Il was a sacred one in which he made patriotism of the Workers' Party of Korea most powerful patriotism replete with the Songun idea and exalted it as model patriotism despite unprecedented hardships.
					
					 His patriotic devotion resulted in all creation demonstrative of the inexhaustible might of the DPRK including the political and ideological might, the potentials of self-supporting national economy as well as self-defensive nuclear deterrent and many grand edifices.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is a matchless patriot's life review of his ideas and theories and the most precious heritage he bequeathed down to posterity out of patriotism.
					
					 The article called upon the party, the army and the people to finish all the work he planned and pushed forward for the country and the people in order to translate his ideas and desire into a brilliant reality on this land.
					
					 Prosperity and glory are in store for the DPRK and its people advancing toward the high eminence of a thriving nation under the uplifted slogan "Forward to Final Victory!" put forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the article concluded.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Reptile Media of Their Ceaseless Smear Campaign
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Reptile Media of Their Ceaseless Smear Campaign 
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- South Korean conservative media are still busy letting loose sheer lies and invectives in a bid to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					 Still running high among the service personnel and other people in the north is the anger at the diehard conservative media which rubbed salt in their wounds when they were grieving over the big loss to the nation and hurled a whole string of vituperation at the mourners. 
					
					 They are now hell bent on hurling malignant slanders and calumnies at the social system and dignity of the DPRK. 
					
					 Chosun Ilbo, Yonhap News and Economic Daily recently let loose such rubbishes as "expenses for the celebrations of the Day of the Sun". Yonhap News, in particular, took issue with foreign media's travel notes on Pyongyang with malignance, not content with defaming the popular policy of the DPRK for the younger generation. Economic Daily cited rubbishes talked by despicable renegades to find fault with reunions of separated families and relatives in the past. 
					
					 Dong A Ilbo, Munhwa Daily and World Daily have run the whole gamut of wrongs by falsifying facts and spreading misinformation. 
					
					 The ultra-right conservative media in south Korea are no more than poor-looking waiting maids of the ruling quarters who maintain their existence by serving the "government" authorities after losing missions and images as media, and tools of the puppet Intelligence Service. 
					
					 They have totally denied the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and persistently opposed their implementation. They have also incited the adherence to the policy of confrontation. 
					
					 When a big hurdle was laid in the way of north-south dialogue, they shifted the blame for it onto the DPRK, jabbering that "it was something fully expected." They supported the Lee group of traitors in its anti-DPRK farce like blowflies in a stingy ditch, crying out for getting ready for taking several fold retaliation against "provocations from the north". All these are reckless actions far away from the basic mission as media. 
					
					 It is the duty for the media of the nation to work for national reunification as they are undergoing the tragedy of national split. However, the above-said reptile media are doing something that makes even brutes blush, bereft of even elementary reason and position as media.
					
					 The noisy anti-DPRK smear campaign of south Korean conservative media is stoking distrust and hostility quite contrary to national reconciliation and unity and dashing the wishes of the nation for reunification. 
					
					 The conservative media are the root cause of misfortune of the nation and reactionaries little different from the Lee group. 
					
					 It is impossible to achieve progress of south Korean society, national unity and peace of Korea as long as there are ultra-right conservative media in south Korea. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK were entirely just when they clarified their will to blow up the dens of tricksters and liars at a blow and make a clean sweep of the hack media persons taking the lead in defaming the DPRK together with confrontation maniacs. 
					
					 History proves that traitors to the nation have no future. 
					
					 The hack media persons and conservative media will have to pay a dear price for their treason.

articles.title: Human Rights Abusers' Talk about "Human Rights Issue in North" Ridiculed
articles.content:
Human Rights Abusers' Talk about "Human Rights Issue in North" Ridiculed 
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The clan of the "Saenuri Party", a group of human rights abusers in south Korea, is busy with its shameless moves to cook up "law on human rights in the north". 
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak is taking the lead in these moves, asserting that "the human rights issue in the north is more urgent than nuclear or missile issues". The clan of the "Saenuri Party" is intensifying the suppression of progressive forces opposed to those moves, labeling them as "forces following the north". They launched even a "signature campaign" for the adoption of the "law" with such human scum as deserters from the north involved. 
					
					 This is absolutely intolerable as it is another grave, politically motivated provocation against the DPRK and a blatant challenge to the wishes of the nation for independence, democracy and reunification. 
					
					 The "bill on human rights in the north" was introduced by the Lee Myung Bak group in the year when it came to power. This evil bill was reduced to a dead paper after being branded by south Korean people as "a bill supporting anti-DPRK actions" and "bill supporting the leaflet-scattering operation against the north". 
					
					 This four years old bill has failed to pass through the "National Assembly." This fact brings to light its reactionary nature.
					
					 This time the group of traitors reintroduced the retrogressively revised bill. This glaringly reveals its wild ambition to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 Through the concoction of the "law" little short of the fascist "Security Law" the group seeks to round off legal and institutional mechanisms for implementing its policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen and shore up the bankrupt row about "forces following the north" in a bid to stifle the pro-north reunification forces, mislead the public opinion and turn the situation before the upcoming "presidential election" favorable to it. 
					
					 It was the Lee group that turned south Korean society into the world's worst tundra of democracy and human rights. It is ridiculous, therefore, for these criminals to talk about "human rights in the north", forgetting that they have to sit in the dock before long. 
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" clan would be well advised to stop its ridiculous moves and opt to repeal the "SL."

articles.title: All-people Movement against Privatization of Railways Declared
articles.content:
All-people Movement against Privatization of Railways Declared 
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Railway Trade Union under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting on June 16 in the plaza of Seoul Railway Station at which they declared an all-people movement for checking the privatization of railways and building public railways.
					 Attending the meeting were more than 2 000 members of the trade union and solidarity organization. 
					
					 The speakers at the meeting accused the Ministry of Land and Marine Development of repeatedly expressing its will to give big businessmen special privilege and convert tens of thousands of railway workers to part-timers in a bid to privatize railways, a threat to their right to existence.
					
					 They also condemned the Lee Myung Bak "government" for seeking to privatize all fields including healthcare, gas and electricity and thus bring large profits to big businessmen. 
					
					 The present "government's" pro-big businessmen and anti-worker policy is putting not only the workers' right to existence but the security of railways at serious peril, they deplored.
					
					 They declared that the organization would launch the all-people movement to hold in check the authorities' plan and build instead safe public railways.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Calling for Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Urging S. Korea to Sign Military Agreement with Japan
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo carried an article on June 18 denouncing the U.S. for urging south Korea to conclude a military agreement with Japan.
					 The article recalled that the U.S. urged the south Korean authorities to conclude the military agreement with Japan.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Japan still refuses to make apology and reparation for committing brutal genocide after occupying Korea in the past, drenching it with blood. 
					
					The Japanese imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as they not only deprived the Koreans of their mother tongue and names but plundered every Korean family of even its rice bowls and spoons. 
					
					 The Korean nation is required to force Japan to pay for having imposed only misfortune upon it in the past.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once such reckless act as urging the conclusion of a military agreement with Japan, an act little short of paving the way for its reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 The article demanded the authorities flatly turn down the unreasonable call of the U.S. and urge the pullback of its forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Foreign Organizations' Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Foreign Organizations' Websites
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania posted on its internet website "Juche Idea" on June 13 the main content of the congratulatory speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at a joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations in celebration of its 66th birthday.
					 Kim Jong Un in his speech on June 6 expressed his steadfast will to invariably carry forward Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on future and the younger generation. He also indicated the tasks and ways for bringing up the KCU members as reserve forces, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy, who would be responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted on its website on June 14 Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					
					 The work, made public on April 20, 2012 clarifies the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for the revolution and construction. It recalls that Kim Jong Il firmly upheld and protected the idea and cause of the President and wisely led the work to implement them.
					
					 The work also indicates tasks for firmly defending and preserving the idea and feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and glorifying them for all ages.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Peru
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A seminar on leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was held by the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on June 10.
					 Present in the seminar were members of the group and the organization for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people as well as figures of the academic circle.
					
					 The chairman of the study group read out the work to be followed by speeches of its members.
					
					 Speakers said the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism which was organized for the first time in Latin America held a seminar on Kim Jong Il's work as its first activity. It was the great honor for the Juche idea followers to hold the seminar on his work.
					
					 They vowed to fulfill their mission and role in the effort to study and disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Italy
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Italy
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Songun Idea in Fermo of Italy held on June 10 a seminar on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche".
					 Present there were members of the group and Fermo City Committee of the Communist Party of Italy and other Italians.
					
					 The chief of the group said Kim Jong Il's idea and line are permanent guiding principles of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution and their validity and vitality have been proven in the revolutionary practice.
					
					 The WPK with Kim Jong Il as its eternal general secretary will accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun, with a sure organizational and ideological guarantee for leading the revolution and construction to victory, the chief said, adding:
					
					 The work of Kim Jong Un reflects the noble world of moral obligation that the Korean people and the world progressives should possess and his unshakable will to build a thriving socialist country at any cost true to the revolutionary cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 We are sure that the WPK, the guide of socialism, will protect the interests of the people and surely build a thriving socialist country by dint of single-minded unity under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Lectures took place between June 7 and 12 in foreign countries to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The countries are Kyrgyzstan, Bulgaria, Democratic Congo, Guinea, Pakistan and Indonesia.
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party, who is chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was a great event in the history of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il directed tireless efforts to developing the WPK into a party of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Korean people are stepping up the building of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 They will win final victory as long as they have Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The secretary general of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said Kim Jong Il strengthened the WPK into a party that organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people, with his outstanding ideology and theory and unique leadership.
					
					 Kanga Ngerien Jerom, chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, praised Kim Jong Il as a veteran statesman of the world.
					
					 A deputy rector of the Guinean Art College said the Korean people will meet all the challenges of the imperialists by dint of the single-minded unity more powerful than nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Korean People's Effort for Building Thriving Nation Supported by Peruvian Parties, Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Effort for Building Thriving Nation Supported by Peruvian Parties, Organization
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Peru issued a statement on June 13 and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union a joint statement on June 12 as regards the publication of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					 The statements said that Kim Jong Un in his work systematized in an integral way the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who devoted their whole life to socialism, the people and global independence.
					
					 As recognized by the world, the President was a prominent statesman, thinker and theoretician and a great sage in the 20th century who believed in the people as in Heaven, they noted.
					
					 By pursuing the Songun politics, Kim Jong Il shattered the moves of the imperialist allied forces against the DPRK, defended the socialist cause and turned the DPRK into a strong political and military power and a nuclear weapons state, they added.
					
					 The statements expressed conviction that led by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people would certainly win victory in the effort to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Asian Regional Organization
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Asian Regional Organization
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Korea's Peaceful Reunification issued a statement on June 2 to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 President Kim Il Sung showed the Korean people the way of achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country with his wise leadership, determination and great devotion, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It was thanks to his efforts and devotion that a solid foundation for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country was laid in the DPRK.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was published, calling for reunifying the country by the efforts of the Koreans under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea, however, has totally denied the joint declaration. 
					
					 The U.S. forces' constant presence in south Korea and their persistent and reckless political and military confrontation with the DPRK have increased the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The military threats constantly posed by the U.S. and south Korea require all the peace-loving and progressive people in the Asia-Pacific region and the Oceanic region to conduct activities for supporting the peaceful reunification of Korea in firm unity.
					
					 Proceeding from this, we call upon all the regional solidarity and peace organizations to conduct an extensive movement for supporting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Sera sustituida imagen de Kim Il Sung en orden, medallas e insignia
articles.content:
Sera sustituida imagen de Kim Il Sung en orden, medallas e insignia
						
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publicado el dia 20, la imagen del Presidente Kim Il Sung, inscrita en la Orden  Kim Il Sung, la medalla de oro del Premio          Kim Il Sung, la medalla del Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung y la insignia del Premio de Honor Infantil Kim Il Sung, sera sustituida por la otra de el con amplia sonrisa.
					El Presidium de la APS aclaro que la resolucion se ha tomado recogiendo la unanime conviccion y voluntad de todos los militantes del partido, los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes de llevar a feliz termino la sagrada causa revolucionaria del Presidente enalteciendolo como eterno Sol del Juche.

articles.title: Fenomeno meteorologico catastrofico en Corea
articles.content:
Fenomeno meteorologico catastrofico en Corea
						
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- En medio de la continua sequia en la mayor parte de las localidades de Corea, en algunas regiones aparecen los fenomenos muy raros tales como la caida de granizos y lluvias torrenciales.
					Desde 16:50 hasta 17:35 del dia 12 las comunas Pudok y Chongchon del distrito Jaeryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, desde 14:55 hasta 15:30 del dia 20 la comuna Sinjang del distrito Yonsa de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, sufrieron los danos por este fenomeno, respectivamente.
					
					El diametro promedio de granizos caidos en las comunas Pudok y Chongchon fue de 25mm, el maximo, de 30-40 mm, y la altura de granizos amontonados fue de 12 cm y 6 cm, respectivamente.
					
					En la comuna Sinjang cayeron durante 5 minutos los granizos de 5 mm de diametro promedio y la precipitacion fue casi 50 mm durante 30 minutos.
					
					Como resultado, algunas personas fueron heridas y destruidas las viviendas.
					
					El maiz, el trigo y otros cultivos de mas de 200 hectareas en la comuna de Pudok, decenas de hectareas en la Chongchon y mas de 150 hectareas en la Sinjang sufrieron danos.
					
					Ademas, cayeron las lluvias torrenciales los dias 11 y 12 en los distritos de Sinhung y Yonggwang de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, 62 mm y 65 mm,   el dia 15 en el distrito Chonma y Changsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, 50 mm y 52 mm, respectivamente.

articles.title: Clausurada Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Antorcha del Songun
articles.content:
Clausurada Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Antorcha del Songun
						
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada la Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Antorcha del Songun.
					En la ocasion, los jugadores de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur ocuparon el primer lugar en la clasificacion general al ganar en futbol (f), voleibol (f), boxeo (m), maraton (m) y otras disciplinas.
					
					Los representantes de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte resultaron campeones en baloncesto (f), levantamiento de pesas (m) y maraton (f) mientras los de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur se llevaron las medallas de oro en levantamiento de pesas (f), boxeo (f) y atletismo (ambos sexos). Y la Hwanghae del Sur salio vencedora en futbol (m) y judo (ambos sexos).
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en Haeju, capital de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, la ceremonia de clausura.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios militares tripartitas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios militares tripartitas
						
　Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- A partir de hoy, Estados Undos, Japon y el Sur de Corea libran en la zona maritima de la Peninsula Coreana los ejercicios militares de 3 partes.
					　Se dice que esa maniobra se enfocara en el "mejoramiento de la capacidad cooperativa y el cambio de informaciones" para "fomentar el socorro en conjunto de desastres y garantizar la seguridad maritima".
					
					　En un comentario individual difundido este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que esas tres partes quieren librar esos ejercicios en visperas del dia de estallido de la pasada guerra coreana (25 de junio de 1950), lo cual es un suceso que no se puede pasar por alto.
					
					　EE.UU., que abogo por fortalecer la alianza a traves del "tratado de seguridad" con Japon y el "tratado de defensa mutua" con el Sur de Corea, los relaciono estrechamente con el "tratado" Japon-Sur de Corea preparando asi el marco de alianza militar trilateral, senala el comentarista y continua:
					
					　A base de esa alianza, el imperio intenta realizar su estrategia de dominar a Asia-Pacifico y la anti-RPDC poniendo al frente del cumplimiento de esa tarea a los titeres surcoreanos y las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon que se encargaran tambien de ejecutar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					　La fabricacion de ese bloque militar constituye un desafio a la corriente de la epoca actual hacia la paz y la estabilidad de la region, inclusive la Peninsula Coreana. Por consiguiente, se cierne el nubarron de nueva guerra sobre la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					　Pero, las fuerzas hostiles no podran conseguir nada aunque logren formar la alianza.
					
					　El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, que vinieron consolidando el disuasivo de guerra en virtud de la politica de Songun, vigilan agudamente los corrientes ejercicios militares EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea.
					
					　EE.UU. debe justipreciar la tendencia de la epoca y dejarse de aventuras que levantan la ola de Guerra Fria en el Nordeste Asiatico.
